reviews.review_msg: He's the best instructor I met so far he usually shows you how to prove the rules in class. It's a little bit boring but it really help me with further study. Though you might not follow in the class just go through the book ez a+ in the exam.  The only instructor that is better than him is Jamie. They are the best in low-level math courses.
Koopa does go fast in his lectures, but he is great explaining all the topics in detail. He is a very smart professor. Just do his homework and pay attention to his classes, and youll do good.
